infos.info: 1937-1941, weekdays at 3:45, then 11:45 AM. - 1942-1946, mostly at 2:00 PM. - In 1944, a block of soaps by writer Irna Phillips made up a General Mills Hour from 2 - 3PM daily. Characters from Today's Children, The Woman in White, and The Guiding Light crossed over and interchanged in respective storylines. (Dunning) - In the mid-1940's a transition was made from clegy characters to a medical background. In the 1950's the focus was on the Bauer family.
